  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_81175</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_81175</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réflexion de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Reflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão clara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione chiara</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά αντανάκλαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión ligera</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre quatre rayons de lumière frappant un miroir plat. Ceci peut être employé pour  déterminer comment chaque rayon est reflété par le miroir.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows four rays of light hitting a plane mirror. This can be used to determine how each ray is reflected by the mirror.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroir plat</string>
            <string language="en">plane mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayon</string>
            <string language="en">ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt vier Strahlen Licht einen 
flachen Spiegel schlagend. Dieses kann verwendet werden, um 
festzustellen, wie jeder Strahl durch den Spiegel reflektiert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra quatro raios da luz que 
batem um espelho plano. Isto pode ser usado determinar como cada
raio é refletido pelo espelho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra quattro raggi di luce
che colpiscono uno specchio piano. Ciò può essere usata per 
determinare come ogni raggio è riflesso dallo specchio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τέσσερις ακτίνες του 
φωτός που χτυπά έναν καθρέφτη αεροπλάνων. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί για να καθορίσει πώς κάθε ακτίνα απεικονίζεται 
από τον καθρέφτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cuatro rayos de luz que 
golpean un espejo plano. Esto se puede utilizar para 
determinarse cómo cada rayo es reflejado por el espejo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">flacher Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão clara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho plano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione chiara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio piano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφριά αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καθρέφτης αεροπλάνων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ακτίνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión ligera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejo plano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rayo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
